name: The Pink Group
description:
Completely focused on delivering results that exceed expectations and providing the very best customer service, the Pink team are the communications experts who will delight you again and again. It’s this drive and energy, and our wide-range of fresh-thinking branding, marketing and design services, which will take your business to the place it wants to be. Simply, we’re 100% committed to pinpointing and delivering exactly what you need to reach, engage and make your customers take action.
Providing the foundations to everything we do are the strong, enjoyable and long-lasting relationships we develop with our clients. We always take the time to listen to their needs and make sure they’re fully involved in all of the work we do for them. We believe it’s only by working this way that a creative agency can truly understand who a client is, what their business is, what they want to achieve and how they want their customers to respond.
